lead_paragraph: Days after inspiring Manchester City to a Premier League win at Bournemouth on his comeback from injury, Kevin De Bruyne shone again as his team claimed a 2-2 draw at Paris St Germain in their Champions League quarter-final first leg on Wednesday.

headline.print_headline: De Bruyne the Driving Force as Man City Draw in Paris
headline.main: De Bruyne the Driving Force as Man City Draw in Paris

snippet: Days after inspiring Manchester City to a Premier League win at Bournemouth on his comeback from injury, Kevin De Bruyne shone again as his team claimed a 2-2 draw at Paris St Germain in their Champions League quarter-final first leg on Wednesday....
